nodes.text: This BD-3000 luxury droid was stationed on the planet Alderaan at the time of the Clone Wars.

Following the attempted assassination of Senator Padmé Amidala during her political mission to Alderaan, padawan Ahsoka Tano devised a trap to catch the assassin Aurra Sing by having this BD-3000 luxury droid, wreathed in a robe, take Padmé's place at the conference while Padmé castes her speech through the droid via telecommunication from her quarters.
